articles.description: Samhi Hotels IPO subscribed 7% on day 1, with retail portion at 34%, NII portion at 2%, and QIB portion with no subscription.
articles.content: Samhi Hotels IPO subscription status: Samhi Hotels IPO has been subscribed 7% on day 1. Samhi Hotels IPO has opened for subscription today (Thursday, September 14), and will close on Monday, Septembe… [+3426 chars]

articles.title: Adani Group Forms Joint Venture For Marketing Of Green Hydrogen In Japan - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Adani Group on Thursday said it has formed a 50:50 joint venture with Japanese conglomerate Kowa Group for sale of green hydrogen in Japan, Taiwan and Hawaii markets.

articles.title: Return property papers within 30 days of loan repayment: RBI to banks - Hindustan Times
articles.description: These guidelines are for all such documents that are due to be released on or after December 1, the central bank said.
